# HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureDuration

**Global Variable**

The audio exposure event’s duration.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureDuration: String
```

## Discussion

Use this key on headphone audio exposure events. It takes an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] containing the audio level measured in units of time.

## Metadata Keys

- **HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureLevel**: The audio level associated with an audio event.
